alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware; Madison; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 2:53AM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Storm total snow accumulation of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Oneida, Madison, Southern Oneida, Chenango, Otsego, Delaware and Sullivan counties. In Pennsylvania, Northern Wayne, Pike and Southern Wayne counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. Slippery roads are likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Steady snow will mix with freezing drizzle today before tapering off this afternoon. The snow will be wet with a high water content...making shoveling very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorist to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.
